languages.text: "И за это мы должны простить твои прошлые прегрешения? Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. Пылай вечно, нечестивица".

"And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
languages.original_text: "И за это мы должны простить твои прошлые прегрешения? Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. Пылай вечно, нечестивица".

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “难道就因为这一点，我们就应该赦免你过去犯下的罪行吗？平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。愿你永生永世遭到烈焰焚烧，异端渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: “难道就因为这一点，我们就应该赦免你过去犯下的罪行吗？平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。愿你永生永世遭到烈焰焚烧，异端渣滓。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「そんな理由でお前の過去の罪を許せと？平民リザよ、お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、冒涜的な異端、禍つ神々崇拝の罪に問われている。永遠に焼かれろ、不浄で哀れなものよ」
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな理由でお前の過去の罪を許せと？平民リザよ、お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、冒涜的な異端、禍つ神々崇拝の罪に問われている。永遠に焼かれろ、不浄で哀れなものよ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¿Y por eso se supone que debemos perdonarle sus delitos? Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. Arda».
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por eso se supone que debemos perdonarle sus delitos? Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. Arda».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Und deswegen sollen wir Euch für Eure früheren Vergehen begnadigen? Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. Brennt für alle Ewigkeit, gottloser Abschaum."
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: "Und deswegen sollen wir Euch für Eure früheren Vergehen begnadigen? Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. Brennt für alle Ewigkeit, gottloser Abschaum."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Et vous croyez sérieusement que cela vous exonère de vos délits passés ? Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. Brûlez pour l'éternité, misérable mécréante. »
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous croyez sérieusement que cela vous exonère de vos délits passés ? Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. Brûlez pour l'éternité, misérable mécréante. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Bu yüzden de geçmiş suçlarını affetmemiz mi gerekiyor? Avam kesimden Ryzza; korsanlıkla, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekle, din dışı kâfirlikle ve Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapınmakla suçlanıyorsun. İlelebet yan tanrıtanımaz alçak."
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Burn for eternity, ungodly wretch."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yüzden de geçmiş suçlarını af mı etmemiz gerekiyor? Avam kesimden Ryzza, korsanlıktan, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekten ve din dışı kâfirlikten ve Yıkıcı Güçlere tapınmaktan suçlanıyorsun. İlelebet yan, seni tanrı tanımaz alçak."
traits.speaker: Chorda
